attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: We the undersigned implore the Prime Minister to offer full financial assistance to the restoration of the Cutty Sark which has been damaged in fire. The world's only surviving Tea Clipper built in 1869. It has since become a historical London landmark, and we want it saving.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
